attributes.action: Stop Overseas Aid for 24 months, to pay for UK Flooding
attributes.additional_details:
We should stop all Overseas Aid for the next 24 months,
to pay for UK Flooding damage etc. We have spent millions over the last few years on Overseas Aid. It about time we use this money back home for the next 24 months to put are Our country right, to fix damage by the UK flooding etc.
